welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sacaba, Bolivia! Get ready to be charmed by this vibrant city known for its beautiful landscapes, friendly locals, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Sacaba has to offer during your visit."

restaurants.name: Restaurant Cantinflas
restaurants.description: Restaurant Cantinflas is a latin american restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: La Delicia De Pescado
restaurants.description: La Delicia De Pescado is a bbq joint located in the city.

restaurants.name: Chicharrones Originales
restaurants.description: Chicharrones Originales is a south american restaurant located in Cochabamba.

restaurants.name: Pizzeria Malcriada
restaurants.description: Pizzeria Malcriada is a pizzeria located in the city.

restaurants.name: Cayenna
restaurants.description: Cayenna is a bistro located in Cochabamba.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at J Wilsterman Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at J Wilsterman Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
